title: Detox Me Essential Oil Blend
description: Feeling like you could use a good cleansing or detoxing. This Detox Me Essential Oil blend can help improve immune function.
cleaned_text: Feeling like you could use a good cleansing or detoxing. This blend can help improve immune function help make the body's lymph system detox for a healthier feeling all over.. Application: Use 2-3 drops apply in hands and rub around in a clockwise motion and apply over thyroid, kidneys, liver, and bottom of feet. Drink plenty of water to help flush the body of any toxins that get trapped in the tissues and cells. 5ml bottle
